name: crt ex tbl taxizone wo header1

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'CSV1') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [CSV1] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			   FIRST_ROW = 1,
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'week5_azstoragepwyjdyjd_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [week5_azstoragepwyjdyjd_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://week5@azstoragepwyjdyjd.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.taxizone_woHeader1 (
	[LOCATIONID] bigint,
	[BOROUGH] nvarchar(4000),
	[ZONE] nvarchar(4000),
	[SERVICE_ZONE] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [week5_azstoragepwyjdyjd_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CSV1]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.taxizone_woHeader1
GO
